tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BacteriaSequencingData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bacteria_name TEXT,
    dna_sequence TEXT,
    sequencing_date DATE,
    analysis_result JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Bacteria (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
genetic_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
genetic_sequence TEXT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Samples (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
source_bacteria_id INT,
sample_date DATE,
sample_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (source_bacteria_id) REFERENCES Bacteria(id));

CREATE TABLE Experiments (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
sample_id INT,
experiment_date DATE,
experimental_condition VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
result_data TEXT NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES Samples(sample_id));

CREATE TABLE Results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
experiment_id INT,
result_date DATE,
result_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
result_description TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id));
